Name: Almond Pina Colada
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: As the name suggests, this rum-laced cocktail has flavours of pineapple and almond.
Nutrition: One serving of Almond Pina Colada contains 254 calories
